string.name: title_schedule
string.translation_description: The title for the schedule screen where user can see their schedule for Google I/O.

string.name: title_feed
string.translation_description: The title for the feed screen where user can all the updates from Google I/O team.

string.name: title_map
string.translation_description: The title for the map screen where user can see the map of the venue.

string.name: title_info
string.translation_description: The title for the info screen where user can see various information, such as FAQ and travel info.

string.name: filters
string.translation_description: The label for the button to filter sessions by their topics, room, and so on.

string.name: clear_all
string.translation_description: The label for the button to clear all the filter conditions.

string.name: agenda
string.translation_description: The title for the agenda screen where user can see all the sessions they plan to attend.

resources.string: Event added to your starred items

string.name: rate_session
string.translation_description: The label for the button to rate the session by 5 stars

string.name: info_title
string.translation_description: The title for the info screen where user can see various information, such as FAQ and travel info.

string.name: event_title
string.translation_description: The title for the tab that shows interesting events, such as sessions and office hours.

string.name: travel_title
string.translation_description: The title for the tab that shows travel information, such as carpool and bus schedules.

string.name: faq_title
string.translation_description: The title for the tab that shows FAQ.

string.name: settings_title
string.translation_description: Title for the tab that shows all the settings of this app.

item.translation_description: Unit for duration of time by hours. Singular.
Unit for duration of time by hours. Plural.
Unit for duration of time by minutes. Singular.
Unit for duration of time by minutes. Plural.

string.name: menu_item_share_session
string.translation_description: The label for the button to share this session on SNS, etc.

string.name: share_text_session_detail
string.translation_description: The default message to be used when user is sharing an I/O session on SNS, etc.

string.name: intent_chooser_session_detail
string.translation_description: The label for share screen where user can tell people about an I/O session on SNS, etc.

string.name: onboarding_get_started
string.translation_description: The label for the button to start using the app

resources.string: Build your custom I/O experience and reserve seats if you\'re an attendee
Join us online. We\'ll be streaming the keynotes and most sessions live.

string.name: onboarding_label_days
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of days until the conference starts

string.name: onboarding_label_hours
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of hours until the conference starts

string.name: onboarding_label_mins
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of minutes until the conference starts

string.name: onboarding_label_seconds
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of seconds until the conference starts
